about.story: Sofia is a growth strategist with a track record of turning data into tangible results. From scaling startups to revitalizing established brands, she leverages a blend of SEO, copywriting, and data analysis to drive conversions and maximize ROI. She's seen it all, and she's not afraid to call BS.

projects.title: Crowdfunding Launch
projects.description: Orchestrated a crowdfunding campaign that exceeded its goal by 300% in 48 hours, proving the power of targeted messaging and strategic timing.

projects.title: Organic Traffic Surge
projects.description: Built a content marketing strategy that propelled organic traffic from zero to 100,000 monthly visits within a year, demonstrating the long-term value of SEO.

steps.title: Data Inquisition
steps.description: Scrutinize existing data to identify opportunities and validate assumptions. No sacred cows.

steps.title: Hypothesis Forge
steps.description: Craft targeted hypotheses based on data insights. Small, testable, and brutally honest.

steps.title: Iterative Combustion
steps.description: Launch rapid experiments (MVPs), analyze results, and ruthlessly eliminate what doesn't convert. Repeat.

stories.failure: Spent 60% of the annual budget on an influencer marketing campaign with a celebrity who had zero relevance to the product. Result: near-zero sales.
stories.lesson: Relevance trumps reach. Micro-influencers with engaged, targeted communities deliver far superior results than celebrity endorsements.
